ngiemboon: N ge gẅiin meshʉ̀a é tó.
en: I will come when I have a little space of time.
how many ...? (question for nouns from classes 4 and 6)
How many people were at the meeting?

ngiemboon: À tÿɔ̌g mekwɔ̀ʼɔ mesẅé ndá yé.
en: He put the new chairs in his house.

ngiemboon: À ka sáŋ meŋwàʼne metsɔ́ zág.
en: He counted the books, some were missing.
